document.docAuthor: Malagón-Aldana, Leonardo A., Smith, David R., Vilhelmsen, Lars & Serna, Francisco
document.masterDocTitle: The sawflies and woodwasps (Hymenoptera: ‘ Symphyta’) of Colombia

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The sawflies and woodwasps (Hymenoptera: ‘ Symphyta’) of Colombia

subSubSection.paragraph:
P. peleterii ( Gray, 1831 )
( Fig. 1d ): Brazil, Costa Rica, Guyana, Panama, Suriname, Trinidad y Tobago, Venezuela ( Smith 1992 ), COLOMBIA . Amazonas , Leticia , camino a San Martín, PNN Amacayacu, 150m , 3°41’N , 70°15’W , red pan trap, 01 March 2004 , T. Pape D. Arias leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E-149473). Amazonas, Leticia , Vda. Tarapaca, Km 11, Río Tamaca, 100m , 08 November 2001 , E. Flórez leg., 1 ♀ , (ICN-MHN ethanol collection). Amazonas, Le- ticia, Matamata, PNN Amacayacu, 150m , 3°41’S , 70°15’W , malaise trap, 02 October 2001 , D. Chota leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E-149492). Amazonas, Leticia, San Martín, PNN Amacayacu, 150m , 3°46’S , 70°18’W , malaise trap, 15 October 2001 , D. Chota leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E-149502). Bolívar , Alto el Mirador, SFF Los Colorados, 400m , 9°54’N , 75°07’W , malaise trap, 22 April 2001 , E. Deulufeut leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E-149482). Bolívar, Venado, SFF Los Colorados, 320m , 9°54’N , 75°07’W , malaise trap, 02 October 2000 , E. Deulufeut leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E-149489). Chocó , Centro Administrativo Sautatá. Dentro del Bosque, PNN Los Katíos, 30m , 7°51’N , 77°08’W , malaise trap, 05 November 2003 , A. Cansia leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E- 151187 ). Same data, 13 January 2004 , P. López leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E- 151177 ). Same data, 29 May 2003 , P. López leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E-149490).
Guaviare
,
San Jose del Guaviare
, Vda. Playa Güio, Laguna Negra, 140m , 2°35’27”N , 72°42’05”W , sweep net, 12 October 2012 , D. Vargas leg., 1 ♀ , (ICN-MHN ethanol collection).

, Camino Cañaveral-Arrecifes, PNN Tayrona, 50m , 11°18’N , 73°56’W , red pan trap, 21 July 2002 , M. Sharkey D. Arias E. Torres leg., 8 spec. , (IAvH-E-149465 to IAvH-E- 149472). Magdalena , Cañaveral , PNN Tayrona, 30m , 11°20’N , 74°02’W , malaise trap, 17 October 2000 , R. Henriquez leg., 5 spec. , (IAvH-E-149484; IAvH-E-149488; IAvH-E-149495 to 149498). Magdalena , PNN Tayrona, 70m , 11°18’N , 73°56’W , malaise trap, 08 January 2003 , C. Sarmiento leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E-149474 to 149480; IAvH-E-149500). Magdalena , PNN Tayrona, 30m , 11°20’N , 74°02’W , malaise trap, 23 July 2002 , M. Sharkey D. Arias E. Torres leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E-149481). Pueblito , PNN Tayrona, 225m , 11°20’N , 74°02’W , malaise trap, 12 May 2000 , R. Henriquez leg., 3 spec. , (IAvH-E-149485; IAvH-E-149497; IAvH-E-149499). Magdalena , Zaino , PNN Tayrona, 50m , 11°20’N , 74°02’W , malaise trap, 03 November 2000 , R. Henriquez leg., 6 spec. , (IAvH-E- 149483; IAvH-E-149486 to IAvH-E-149487; IAvH-E-149493 to 149493; IAvH-E-149501).
Meta
, Cabaña Cerrillo, PNN Sierra de La Macarena, 460m , 3°21’N , 73°56’W , malaise trap, 29 October 2003 , W. Villalba leg., 2 spec. , (IAvH-E- 151183 to IAvH-E- 151184 ). Meta , Caño Curía, PNN Sierra de La Macarena, 150m , 3°21’N , 72°38’W , malaise trap, 13 February 2004 , W. Villalba leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E- 151175 ). Same data, 10 November 2002 , M. Duarte leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E-149491). Same data, 24 December 2001 , A. Herrera leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E-149504). Meta , Caño Nevera, PNN Tinigua, 390m , 2°11’N , 73°48’W , malaise trap, 23 December 2002 , C. Sánchez leg., 4 spec. , (IAvH-E- 151181 to 151182 ; IAvH-E-149503; IAvH-E- 151185 ). Meta , Puerto Gaitan , Altamira, Club Llaneros, 140m , sweep net, 20 October 2006 , leg., 1 ♀ , (MPUJ_ENT_0057392). Puerto López, Vda. Alto de Menegua, 300m , 4°05’N , 72°48’W , 17 April 1984 , M. Carvajal leg., 1 ♂ , (ICN-MHN). San Juan de Arama , Quebrada La Curia, alrededores estación INDERENA, 580m , 01 September 1987 , leg., 1 ♀ , (ICN-MHN ethanol collection). Sendero Las Mirlas, PNN Sumapaz, 779m , 3°48’N , 73°52’W , malaise trap, 28 April 2004 , H. Vargas leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E- 151176 ). La Macarena , Vda. Bajo Raudal, PNN Tinigua, 290m , 2°16’N , 73°48’W , malaise trap, 05 September 2004 , J. Sánchez leg., 10 spec. , (IAvH-E- 151169 to 151174 ; IAvH-E- 151178 to 151180 ; IAvH-E- 151186 ). Meta , Villavicencio , Vda. La Vanguardia, Pozo Azul, 423m , 4°09’N , 73°37’W , malaise trap, 17 April 2005 , Curso Sistemática Animal leg., 3 ♀ , (ICN-MHN).
Santander
, Puerto Parra, Campo Capote, 150m , 6°37’N , 73°54’W , 05 March 2008 , Curso Sistemática Animal leg., 1 ♀ , (ICN-MHN). Same data, 10 March 2008 , Sistematica Animal leg., 1 ♀ , (ICN-MHN ethanol collection). Sucre , San Onofre , Reserva Sanguaré, 2m , 9°42’32”N , 75°40’33”W , hand collecting, 14 October 2003 , leg., 2 ♀ , (CEUA 60121 to CEUA 60122).
Valle del Cauca
, January 1900 , leg., 1 ♂ , (CEUNP).
Host: Cnestidium rufescens
( Connaraceae ) in Panama ( Kimsey & Smith 1985 [as
Ptilia concinna
]); Smith, 1992 ).

P. una D. R. Smith 1992
: Brazil, Guyana ( Smith 1992 ), COLOMBIA .
Valle del Cauca
, Cali , 1000m , 3°17’N , 76°31’W , 01 September 1981 , leg., 2 spec. , (MUSENUV).

P. versicolor ( Klug, 1834 )
: Belize, Costa Rica, Guatemala, Honduras, Mexico ( Smith 1992 ), COLOMBIA .
Magdalena
, PNN Tayrona, administración, 5m , 26 June 2001 , I. Ávila leg., 4 ♂ , (ICN-MHN ethanol collection). Same data, 19 June 2001 , C. Sarmiento leg., 1 ♀ , (ICN-MHN ethanol collection). Magdalena , PNN Tayrona, sector Ca- ñaveral, 5m , 01 July 2001 , C. Sarmiento leg., 7 ♀ 6♂ , (ICN-MHN ethanol collection). Same data, 04 December 2001 , C. Sarmiento leg., 3 ♀ , (ICN-MHN ethanol collection). PNN Tayrona, sector Cañaveral, Pueblito, 20 June 2001 , C. Sarmiento, I. Ávila leg., 1 ♀ 1 ♂ , (ICN-MHN ethanol collection). Host: Reared from
Rourea glabra
( Connaraceae ) ( Smith 1992 ).
